The video was published on Twitter on Ju: 2020, and has been viewed over 35,700 times.
The video shows people sitting around a: with remarks that translate to English as "It's time to eat now! Yay! Let's show everyone our hearty main dishes!"
The video includes simplified Chinese te: stating "Opposes the US for work, but lives in the US / Admiral Zhang's family sent greetings from the US!" The video also contains the logo of Douyin, the Chinese version of TikTok.
